website_summaries.verdict: Nice 6-foot length with solid build quality for a reasonably priced USB 3.0 cable extender.
pros: With 6 feet of length in the cable, you'll have a lot of flexibility in how you use it
Delivers the high speed transfers you expect with USB 3.0
Easy to use and features a nice build quality, so it'll last
cons: If you need to bend the cable, this model may be too stiff

customer_reviews.title: Works with select devices
customer_reviews.text: Garbage!! I purchased for Oculus Rift and it worked very good, but now I have also purchased WMR Odyssey+ and it won't work! It works for 30 sec and then system doesn't see the HMD. I know it's the cable and not the HMD, because HMD works when I plug in directly to USB 3.0 in my computer. It should work regardless of the device plugged in. If it's not that means the standards are not met!!!! now I have to buy another cable that works with Odyssey! FU!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Power Output and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to extend my phone charging cable and also make my phone cable last longer. My phone charges very fast through this cable and the cable seems like it's durable, but my only complaint is the female end of cable is not as tight as I would like. Other than that I love this cable!
customer_reviews.author: DW627

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 and hooked them up to each other to increase the length into 12ft instead of 6ft and it only works when you use it alone as a 6ft cable, not when you hook them up to each other to extend them into 12ft length. I have a 10 port USB hub and won't show any of my external hard drives when they are hooked up to each other. When used alone however it did show all 6 of my external hard drives, but when combined together shows only 2 of them, which defeats the purpose. So i'm returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Barno

customer_reviews.title: Great for VR!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Oculus Rift as an extension cable for the headset, it's working perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the length I needed
customer_reviews.text: The only 1.5ft usb 3.0 extension I could find on amazon at the time. I needed an extension for my mouse and 1ft wasn't long enough and 3ft, the next size up, was too long. I found this and it works perfect in length and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: OmniPhillips

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for one of my Oculus Rift sensors. Even though I'm plugging this to a USB 3.0 port on my computer, the Oculus software thinks it's 2.0 (and it's 3.0 without the extension). Nevertheless, since I have the other sensor directly plugged to a 3.0 port, it's not giving me any problems. And I know this issue might depend on other things such as my USB bus.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: You can never go wrong with Monoprice
customer_reviews.text: I've bought A LOT from Monoprice in the past and have never had an issue. The USB extension is stout and can handle some abuse. Bought it for a wired mouse extension. Due to its robust build quality, it weighed down the mouse cable, but I just wire tied it to another cable and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Im the Bean

customer_reviews.title: Monorpice, reliability as always
customer_reviews.text: When your PC is off the desk and you need to extend your Keyboard and mouse cables, you use the most reliable cables available from the most reliable cable maker. These are long enough for my needs and they are Monoprice which means they will be working till we switch to USB type C for everything. I have used other extension cables and always had problems from other company's products. So since all my video cables and ethernet cables are from Monorpice I assumed that their extension cables would be of the same quality as the rest of their line, it seems that I was right.
customer_reviews.author: Robb

customer_reviews.title: Overly Tight Female Connector
customer_reviews.text: I am normally very pleased with Monprice products, however, I tried plugging in different USB devices into the female end of the cable, and the connection was so tight and difficult to mate that I feared it would damage the connection. It's a shame because all metal parts are made of gold, the cable has a thick jacket with nicely molded ends, and is USB 3 capable.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about an extension for USB dropping the speeds or quality of my products, but this thing works perfectly, as advertised. It feels pretty quality, too.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I used this extension cable for my Oculus Rift to extend the headset for friends and family who are taller than 6 feet, as this helps to make the cable less cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: AC5319

customer_reviews.title: Did what it should, what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a USB extension, and this did the trick! I actually use it for a light ring. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Cable works good. Good length. Used it for moving my backup hard drive to the back of my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Fields

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality usb extension. Used to extend a short cable that came with my webcam.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Reports as USB 2 for oculus rift.
customer_reviews.text: Used for oculus rift but it never sees this as a 3.0 USB. In settings it reports I am only using usb 2 unless I remove this cable. Seems to be causing performance issues.
customer_reviews.author: Will F.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you expect
customer_reviews.text: Firm and sturdy little cord, had a wired mouse that was just a tad too short
customer_reviews.author: Softie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality USB extension cables
customer_reviews.text: I need to have some 3.0 USB extensions and these were just perfect. The quality is tops and I plan to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Phantom Phreak

customer_reviews.title: 6ft Works with Rift S
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 different usb 3.0 extension cords for my rift s before I found this one and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy akers

customer_reviews.title: It works great. Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an extender for my Oculus Rift. It works great. Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: K Y

customer_reviews.title: Working fine with VR headset.
customer_reviews.text: It's is doing its job working fine. It's a cord doing what cords do.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Truax

customer_reviews.title: I love Monoprice!!!
customer_reviews.text: Monoprice is the best! They always have excellent products at low, low prices. I've been a customer for years and I'll be a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Cuskley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works. Feels heavy like it's high quality. Great price. Monoprice is great.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great price, works as expected
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty much exactly as you'd expect. Just a small extension for a USB port. No issues whatsoever and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Workman

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for extending my Sensors on my Oculus Rift, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: BRADLEY E.

customer_reviews.title: solved problem
customer_reviews.text: This USB extension cord allowed me to position my web cam at a better location.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Green

customer_reviews.title: works fine
customer_reviews.text: Works fine as a extension for my headphones. No more tangled in my arms during heavy action games!
customer_reviews.author: dimmer

customer_reviews.title: great for vr extension
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my rift headset and it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Does the job however cable is somewhat stiff and very ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job however cable is somewhat stiff and very thick - 0.22" / 5.6mm. Should last a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Quality interconnect
customer_reviews.text: great quality for a low price. No concerns over delay or drop in signal
customer_reviews.author: Darren Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to extend the cable for my 3rd Oculus Rift sensor. I have had no issues and it continues to work fine for what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rodgers

product_meta.title: Monoprice Select Series USB 3.0 A to A Female Extension Cable 6ft use with Playstation, Xbox, Oculus VR, USB Flash Drive, Card Reader, Hard Drive, Keyboard, Printer, Camera and More!
product_meta.description: Size:6 FeetConnect your SuperSpeed USB 3.0 cable using this USB 3.0 A Male to A Female Extension Cable from Monoprice! This cable features a USB 3.0 A male connector on one end and a USB 3.0 A female connector on the other end. This allows you to extend the reach of your existing USB 3.0 cables.
feature_bullets: This cable features a USB 3.0 A male connector on one end and a USB 3.0 B female connector on the other end.
The USB 3.0 B connector differs from the traditional USB 2.0 B connector in that it has 5 additional pins, which carry SuperSpeed data.
28 AWG data conductors and 24 AWG power conductors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars117 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
